Bash(git -C /tmp/agent-worktrees/QuickCorrect-worker3-integration-preload-react commit -m "Implement preload script and React integration for issue #17

- Add preload script with contextBridge API for secure IPC communication
- Create React hooks for Electron API integration:
  - useElectronAPI: Main hook for accessing Electron API
  - useCorrection: Text correction functionality
  - useSettings: Application settings management
  - useHistory: Correction history management
  - useWindowControls: Window control functions
  - useClipboard: Clipboard operations
  - useTextSelection: Handle text selection events
- Update App.tsx to use the new hooks instead of direct window.electronAPI
- Add controller classes for main process:
  - ClipboardController: Handle clipboard operations
  - HotkeyController: Manage global hotkeys
  - CorrectionController: Handle text correction logic
- Update main.ts with complete IPC handlers for all API methods
- Implement type-safe IPC channel names and validation")
